column2: "What's with you? Did you come here to laugh at me?"
"Laugh if you want. This seventy-five year old weapon smith is all washed up."
"I'm burned out. I've lost all will to create anything."
"During the decisive battle 40 years ago, my heart was ablaze! And twenty years ago, too. Conflict brings out my passion!"
"But as the tides of battle have calmed, so too has my passion waned."
"I still want to make something with these hands, but it can't be something half-baked. That's my pride as a craftsman speaking."
"Sorry for making you listen to an old man's ramblings. What did you come to me for again?"
"Oh, but one thing about what I said. If you find something to bring back my passion, please show it to me."
"I just need something to inspire me."
